Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Exempts charitable corporations from the imposition of the metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax
Summary: Exempts charitable corporations formed pursuant to the provisions of the not-for-profit corporation law for charitable purposes from the imposition of the metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the exemption of charitable corporations formed pursuant to the provisions of the not-for-profit corporation law for charitable purposes from the imposition of the metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax
